messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the correction. I ve dealt a lot with samuraidvd.com . He is VERY reputable and responsive and gives movie fans a superior product. Nina _____ From:
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the correction. I've dealt a lot with samuraidvd.com . He is VERY reputable and responsive and gives movie fans a superior product.

Nina


_____

From: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com [mailto:samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com]
Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2006 8:08 AM
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [samuraihistory] Re: Samurai movies



Correction, my dealing was with samuraimoviedvd.com.
Samuraiidvd website appears to be a reputable seller- sorry for any
confusion.
Jim

messages.subject: Re: Samurai movies
messages.msgSnippet: Just a warning, I ordered this series from the samuraidvd.com website, and the 6th disk is not watchable. I have tried on 3 occasions through email to contact
messages.messageBody:
Just a warning, I ordered this series from the samuraidvd.com website,
and the 6th disk is not watchable.
I have tried on 3 occasions through email to contact them regarding a
replacement for the bad disk, and have gotten no response.
Dan is correct, it is a fantastic series, however, I would recommend a
more reliable source-
Jim

messages.subject: Samurai movies
messages.msgSnippet: I am a huge collector. Not sure if this site has been mentioned here before but its a great one. If you dont have the Tokugawa movie (AOI, 3 Generations of
messages.messageBody:
I am a huge collector. Not sure if this site has been mentioned here
before but its a great one. If you dont have the Tokugawa movie (AOI,
3 Generations of Tokugawa) yet, you should get it! It features a two
hour segment covering the battle of Sekigahara. A classic!

Dan

www.samuraimoviedvd.com/
